description: After a weekend camping, roll back into your weekday hustle without ever unpacking or digging through your closet for the last clean item—the Big Cottonwood™ is both your camp shirt and work attire. Secure double pockets keep your keys safe while you send, a soft cotton blend keeps you feeling airy and dry, while its classic button-up style and patterns are adaptable to any environment.
name: Mountain Hardwear Big Cottonwood LS Shirt - Mens

specs.value: Yarn Dye Plain Weave Woven - 100% Cotton
